name: Fortissimo Combo!
text: Return 1 "Meklord Emperor" monster from your hand to its owner's Deck and play 1 face-up "Fortissimo the Mobile Fortress" to your field from outside of the Deck. If there already is Field Spell on your side of the field, return it to your hand. This Skill can only be used once per turn and twice per Duel.
